definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
boat deck (upper deck on which lifeboats are stored)

sentences.english: Climb down nets, and embark the lifeboat over manropes, everyone.
sentences.chinese: 每個人爬下救生網，用扶手繩登上救生艇。

sentences.english: Replace lifeboat container in next port.
sentences.chinese: 下一港更換救生艇櫃子。

sentences.english: Else the life-boat would be out hunting us.
sentences.chinese: 不然的話，救生艇就會開出來尋找我們。

sentences.english: Rescue boat assisting No. 1 lifeboat standing clear of vessel now.
sentences.chinese: 營救船正在幫助1號救生艇讓開母船。

sentences.english: Lifeboats not in water in last 3months.
sentences.chinese: 救生艇在3個月內沒有放下水。

sentences.english: This is actually a little bit bigger than some of the life boats and dinghies that you'd have in the U.
sentences.chinese: 這個要比在美國看到的一些救生艇和小遊艇要大很多。

sentences.english: Securedwatertight doors and lashed up lifeboats for heavy weather.
sentences.chinese: 緊閉水密門，綁緊救生艇，預防惡劣天氣。

sentences.english: As there were not enough life-boats for everybody.
sentences.chinese: 沒有足夠的救生艇運載所有乘客。

sentences.english: The lifeboats were laid alongside the wreck to the sailors.
sentences.chinese: 救生艇駛近遇難船隻營救船員。

sentences.english: In many times, life-boats should be lifted at complicated and abominable sea state.
sentences.chinese: 在很多時候，救生艇需要在複雜的高海況下回收。

sentences.english: And with waters rising higher, the rescue boats of the Cranston Fire Department came calling.
sentences.chinese: 隨着水位不斷升高，克蘭斯敦消防部門的救生艇來了。

sentences.english: Investors should prepare to man the lifeboats.
sentences.chinese: 投資者應當爲跳上救生艇做好準備。

sentences.english: The panic - stricken passengers tried to rush the life - boats .
sentences.chinese: 驚慌的旅客爭先恐後，想擠進救生艇。

sentences.english: As soon as the alarm was given, the lifeboat was launched.
sentences.chinese: 警報聲一響，救生艇立即被放下了水。
